prompt: A young man with short dark hair, wearing glasses with blue frames and dressed in a white shirt, stands in front of a microphone, speaking into it with an animated expression that conveys his enthusiasm. As he delivers his speech, he raises his right fist in a gesture of emphasis or excitement before lowering it back down, all while his body remains mostly stationary and facing forward towards the camera. The background is adorned with colorful posters and drawings, indicating that this is likely an indoor event or gathering. With bright lighting that highlights him clearly against the vibrant backdrop, the atmosphere feels lively and engaging, perfectly complementing his passionate delivery.
identity_prompt: A young man with short dark hair, wearing glasses with blue frames, and dressed in a white shirt
